name: @antonycc/root-diyaccounting-co-uk
description: Root account DNS and holding page management for diyaccounting.co.uk

scripts.cdk:synth: cd cdk-root && npx cdk synth --require-approval never --ci true --strict --validation && cd ..
scripts.cdk:diff: cd cdk-root && npx cdk diff && cd ..
scripts.diagram:root: npm run cdk:synth && bash -c 'for f in cdk-submit-root.out/*.template.json; do npx @mhlabs/cfn-diagram draw.io -c -s -t "$f" -o "cdk-root-$(basename $f .template.json).drawio"; done' && for f in cdk-root-*.drawio; do node scripts/clean-drawio.cjs "$f"; done
